name: Our Little Chase
description:
''Executioner! Hunt down the traitor who dares to proclaim himself the king and bring peace to the Empire!''

Our Little Chase is a strategy-action game where you start with only yourself and gradually build up your army to face the traitor.

This game combines real-time battles with roguelike campaign map as you move from point to point toward your goal. Inspired by 'Mount and Blade' and 'Total War' series.

Features:

  • Procedurally generated map to ensure replay value.
  • Unique handcrafted maps
  • Control your army directly to fight for you or join in the fight yourself.
  • Or sneak away from your enemies. Remember your target is the traitor.
  • Permanent death, so think twice before joining the combat.
  • Fully customizable arsenal for your character and your troops.
  • Manage your inventory, make sure you have enough supplies for your troops.
  • Interrogate the villager, find out where that traitor has gone to.
  • Every choice has a consequence.
  • Multiple ending.
